name: Rewinder (Jacki112, holyfreak2)
description:
Rewinder

This is a submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.

You play as a contract killer who got a mutation. He can rewind the past movement of single enemies.

Controls:

R: Rewind movement

E: Interact

W/A/S/D or Arrow keys: Movement

Left mouse button: Stealth Attack (while close to enemy) / Shoot (while aiming)

Right mouse button: Aim

The sprites, animations and programming was made by us (Paul Eidenmüller, Philipp Rosenthal). Sound Effects are from various Composers. This game was made in Unity. It was our first "completed" game, however we already had experience in Unity, Pixelart and programming. Feel free to give us feedback in the comments.

If you want some early footage of our future games follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Ps_Pixel_Tavern
